testcase.classname: Find the maximum price for Best Sellers in a specific department
testcase.name: User clicks on Best Sellers, selects a department, and finds the maximum price - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on amazon home page.......................................passed When the user clicks on Best sellers link...................................passed Then the user will be navigated to Amazon Best seller.......................passed And the user selects the specific department from the left side bar "Baby"..passed And the user will be navigated to Best Sellers in specific department "Baby".passed And the user extracts the prices of all best-selling items in two pages.....passed And the user clicks on the product corresponding to the maximum price.......passed
